description:
This emoji means to own or posses.

CJK Ideographs are characters used in Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages. Their writing systems all completely or partly use Chinese characters.
apple_vendor_description: The Japanese 'Not Free of Charge' button on Apple devices presents a vibrant, circular design with a prominent red border and a crisp white background. Inside, the Japanese characters are rendered in a bold, classic font, accented by a subtle glossy sheen that gives it a distinct Apple dimensionality. This emoji conveys a sense of cost or a paid service, often appearing in contexts related to shopping or subscriptions within Apple's ecosystem.
